metadata.synopsis: If players made a deal with Raphael and came to take the contract, and then will first save Hope, then Raphael is going to take it. Archivist will make a comment on that.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Set the debug option in the Debug Book to "make a deal with Raphael"3. Free Hope with Orphic Hammer4. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_CheckMainTreasuresTrigger

2.speaker: Archivist
2.text: I'm afraid your contract was reclaimed by your patron, the esteemed master of this house, as is his right under the Memorandum of Understanding agreed upon at the time of signing if the party of the signatories were found to be in violation of any of several binding clauses.

0.speaker: Archivist
0.text: In short - you are dead, and your soul is his.
